title: Safety Lost
description: Finding himself all alone, Ryan decides to follow after Lily and the group with the hope of meeting up with them as soon as possible.What would have been a short journey before the apocalypse began, is now a perilous trek through the zombie infested countryside of England. With no weapons and few supplies, Ryan has to do what he can to survive.This is the third book in the Killing the Dead series and contains adult language, themes and violence.
author: Richard   Murray
